summary: The Interstate Paid Leave Action Network Act of 2025 (I-PLAN Act) establishes a network to support the development and adoption of an interstate agreement for streamlining and harmonizing state-level paid family and medical leave programs. It aims to reduce administrative burdens and facilitate easier compliance for employers with multi-state operations while providing support and incentives for the creation of a consistent framework for benefits delivery across participating states. The bill authorizes funding for a national intermediary to assist the network and grants to eligible states.
